author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

The data products passed to the selectors were all fixed types so no need for lazy evaluation of the types.
Also removed an unnecesary dynamic cast.

#### PR validation:

The code compiles. As they types always known at compile time anyway, this should have no change to the behavior.

I found this while looking at memory hoarding check in #40437. It wasn't that large but we might as well fix it anyway.
title: Removed unnecessary lazy object selection in TopMonitor
